attributes.long-description:
Prepare for a tranquil journey through the seasons with Storm, an ambient, ethereal experience where you use natural phenomena to guide a simple seed to fertile soil so it can take root and spring to life.

There's no hurry here as you use wind, rain, lightening, snow, tornadoes, ice and bubbles to bring the seed safely home. Move a broken branch, fill a small pond and make snow fall to solve puzzles and create perfect paths.

Some of Storm's elements include:
• Simple Controls - Use either the standard or the Move controller to manipulate the various elements at your own pace.
• Gorgeous Environments - Interactive environments react to your every move as you make a path for your seed's many journeys.
• Ambient Soundtrack – Enjoy the soothing soundscapes as you move the world around you.
• Three Modes Across Four Seasons: Choose between Adventure, Challenge and Spirit modes for multiple levels of enjoyment.

1 player
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i, 1080p
PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move navigation controller or Wireless Controller optional.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and this item's use restrictions. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems that are associated with the purchasing account.

PlayStation®Move features require PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye (sold separately).
attributes.name: Storm
